price: Akasema: Enyi wahishimiwa! Ni nani kati yenu atakaye niletea kiti chake cha enzi kabla hawajanijia nao wamekwisha salimu amri.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: Sulaiman akawaelekea binaadamu na majini aliyo dhalilishiwa na Mwenyezi Mungu kumtumikia, akawashitua kwa jambo geni. Akasema: Ni nani katika nyinyi anaweza kuniletea kiti chake cha enzi kikubwa kabla hawajanijia nao wamekwisha nyenyekea wanat'ii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla yāayyuhā al-mala-u ayyukum yatīnī biʿarshihā qabla an yatūnī mus'limīna
